channel.title: Aditya Mangal's Blog
channel.description: The goal of this blog is to talk about things I'm working on, discuss some of the personal projects I'm spending time on and some random thoughts and musings.

item.title: Welcome to Aditya Mangal
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: Welcome to our new blog, Aditya Mangal. We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!

item.title: India Transportation Accidents Exploration Project
item.dc:creator: Aditya Mangal
item.description: With this project I will try to visualize and understand the traffic accident data for India as publicly accessible [here](https://data.gov.in/)
